page.title: 05SCRAP YARD__ EX_LINE TRAVEL
page.content: {THE SCRAP YARD}HAS BEEN IN WILLAND FOR 18 MONTHS. THEY CAME TO WILLAND BECAUSE IT WAS A NICE RURAL PLACE, NEAR THE MOTORWAY ROUTE AND THE ONLY SPACE THEY COULD GET. 3 TO 4 PEOPLE WORK THERE. THE MACHINERY THEY USE IS HY_MAC LORRY AND HY_HAB. THEY TAKE THEIR SCRAP TO E.B. JAMES IN TIVERTON. THEIR BUISNESS IS GETTING BETTER. THE MOST EXPENSIVE CAR THEY HAVE SCRAPPED WAS A MERCEDES 280SE AT ABOUT Â£12000. {EX_LINE TRAVEL }COACH FIRM HAVE BEEN IN WILLAND FOR TWO YEARS. THEY HAVE 5 BUSES ON THE ROAD 3 BEING FIXED. THEY CHOSE WILLAND BECAUSE IT HAD LARGE PARKING SPACES. NOBODY CRITICIZES THEM BEING THERE. THE DRIVERS EARN ABOUT Â£55O A MONTH. THEY ENJOY THEIR JOB. THEY THINK THE FIRM WILL GROW IN THE NEXT 18 MONTHS. THEY HAVE A DEPOT IN EXETER. {SPEARINGS GARAGES NEAR THE {SCHOOL }ALSO RUN A COACH FIRM.
